moonay.modifytooltip.stigma: Deals additional damage for each target hit and heals ♥ :
moonay.modifytooltip.stigma.desc: If the target's health is below
moonay.modifytooltip.stigma.desc2: It will automatically execute the target
moonay.gui.player_info.tooltip.critchanc: Indicates the likelihood of landing a 'Critical Hit.
moonay.gui.player_info.tooltip.critdamag: Represents the additional damage dealt with a 'Critical Hit'
moonay.gui.player_info.tooltip.damagered: The percentage of incoming damage that is negated.
enchantment.moonay.carve.desc: Reduces the target's protection with each attack. After attacking for a while, Right-clicking can trigger a healing effect.
enchantment.moonay.stigma.desc: Allows the player to perform a special attack when the target has low health. Right-clicking can heal the player and deal damage around them.
enchantment.moonay.apinox.desc: Increases Critical Damage for every 10% exceeding 100% Crit Chance by 1% per level.
enchantment.moonay.praminax.desc: After attacking twice, the next attack deals player attack damage multiplied by 20% per enchantment level.
enchantment.moonay.thousandneedle.desc: Shoots needles from the sky. The number of needles increases with the status effect amplifier.
enchantment.moonay.goliath.desc: Deals extra damage based on current target's health. by 3% per enchantment level.
